article_title: Yahoo Pays to Play in Mobile Ad Market With Deal for Flurry
article_text:
Yahoo Inc. said it is acquiring mobile app analytics provider Flurry Inc. in a bid to boost advertising revenue from smartphones.

Financial terms of the deal weren't disclosed.

The Internet portal has agreed to pay more than $200 million for...

twitter.description: Yahoo is acquiring mobile app analytics provider Flurry for more than $200 million in a bid to boost advertising revenue from smartphones.
twitter.title: Yahoo Pays to Play in Mobile Ad Market With Deal for Flurry
